name: Vegan Pepperoni
description: Easy vegan pepperoni recipe made with vital wheat gluten flour (seitan) and the perfect blend of spices! Perfect on pizza, sandwiches or on a vegan appetizer platter with crackers and dairy free cheese.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, mix together all the dry ingredients.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, mix together all the dry ingredients.

recipeInstructions.text: In a smaller bowl, whisk all the wet ingredients together until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: In a smaller bowl, whisk all the wet ingredients together until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the wet into the dry ingredients and mix with a large spoon until it comes together. It will be like a dough that is pretty rough at this point.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the wet into the dry ingredients and mix with a large spoon until it comes together. It will be like a dough that is pretty rough at this point.

recipeInstructions.text: Turn the dough onto a work surface and knead until smooth. Break into 3 sections and shape each section into logs about 2 inches in diameter.
recipeInstructions.name: Turn the dough onto a work surface and knead until smooth. Break into 3 sections and shape each section into logs about 2 inches in diameter.

recipeInstructions.text: Wrap tightly in aluminum foil, twisting the ends to secure.
recipeInstructions.name: Wrap tightly in aluminum foil, twisting the ends to secure.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 60 minutes, placing the foil-wrapped logs directly on the oven racks.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 60 minutes, placing the foil-wrapped logs directly on the oven racks.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from oven, unwrap and let cool for 5-10 minutes. Slice the pepperoni very thin, or thicker if desired. Store extra pepperoni in an air tight container or plastic wrap.
